purpose: The email announces the Joint Call for Papers for the 29th ETAPS International Joint Conferences on Theory and Practice of Software, scheduled to take place in Torino, Italy, from April 11-16, 2026. It provides details about the conference, including submission deadlines, publication information, and the types of contributions sought. The email highlights the significance of ETAPS as a leading forum for software science research and outlines the new features for the 2026 event, such as strict submission deadlines and a double-blind reviewing process for one of the conferences. Additionally, it mentions the awards that will be given for distinguished papers and the importance of artifact evaluation in the submission process.
